channel.title: Pest Control + Fight Pits
channel.description:
I need help with my fight pits, It teleports you in and everything, but it isn't a fighting area. It doesn't let you fight anyone, and basically, when the time runs out is when the game is over. I need to make it a safe fighting area.
Another thing is my Pest Control, I need to adjust the number of points it takes for the prizes.
Thanks in advance. (317 btw)

@WestSideMass wrote:

I didn’t realize Fight Pits was a single code. If it takes alot of effort, I’m not going to bother.
All I need is to make it so you can fight in it. The “Attack” option isn’t there.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2009, 08:43:36 pm[/size][hr][quote=“runescapepkserver, post:8, topic:307724”][quote author=xxpkpurexx link=topic=403873.msg2989794#msg2989794 date=1255227316]
im sorry i cant help ill look forward to that ill try to find a way to do it for u
[/quote]

STOP FUCKING POSTING IF YOU AREN’T EVEN FUCKING HELPING. How the hell is telling him it has to recoded is going to help him? Obviously if it doesn’t work IT HAS TO BE RECODED OR EDITED. And I also see you posting on other threads flaming or just posting dumbass comments. Fucking quit.[/quote]Last I checked, your post isn’t very helpful either.
